relevant_findings.skeletal: bilateral severe Madelung deformities, rhizomelic shortening of all limbs, mild levoscoliosis with apex at thoracic spine, bilaterally short fourth metacarpals
relevant_findings.radiological: marked shortening and thickening of femur, tibia, fibula, humerus, ulna, and radius bilaterally, with tibia/fibula being more significantly involved

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: No clinical deterioration of the skeletal deformities during GH therapy.
